short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take note of everything you want!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace the new tab page with a very simple and useful notepad.

You can write everything, you mind, Lum also tells you the day and the weather in your location. The wheather recharge every hour when you open the tab or you can reload manually.
I hope this helps you to be more productive.

To see the code visit my GitHub.
